text: Saugat Malla (born 7 June 1981) in Nawalparasi, Nepal is a Nepali film actor and producer. He started his career from the superhit Nepali movie Loot which made him widely recognized all over Nepal. He rose fame from hit Nepali movies Mukhauta , Soongava, Lappan Chhappan, Kabaddi Kabaddi , Loot 2,Fateko Jutta, & Fanko. In Fateko Jutta, a romantic movie directed by Nikesh Khadka, he acted with Priyanka Karki and Kameshwor Chaurasiya. The film did not do well in the Nepali box office but audience love the chemistry between Malla and Priyanka Karki. ==References== ==other websites== * Category:Nepalese movie actors Category:1976 births Category:Actors from Kathmandu Category:Living people Category:Nepalese movie producers
title: Saugat Malla
